profile.title: Umwirondoro w'umukoresha
profile.mustLogin: Ugomba kwinjira kugira ngo ubone amagenamiterere.
profile.noPrivateKey: Nta urufunguzo rwihariye kuri iki gikoresho rwo kohereza.
profile.setBackupPassword: Shyiraho ijambo ry’ibanga ryo kubika inyuma mu buryo buringaniye:
profile.backupDownloaded: Inyandiko ibitswe mu buryo buringaniye yaramanutse.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Injiza ijambo ry’ibanga ry’iyi kopi ibitswe:
profile.importSuccess: Urufunguzo rwihariye rwazanywe kuri iki gikoresho.
profile.importFailed: Kuzana urufunguzo byanze (ijambo ry’ibanga ritatanye cyangwa dosiye yangiritse).
profile.keysRotated: Urufunguzo rushya rwakozwe kandi urufunguzo rusangiwe rwoherejwe.
profile.importKey: Zana kopi ibitswe mu buryo buringaniye
profile.keyDisclaimer: Urufunguzo rwawe rwihariye ntiruvayo kuri iki gikoresho. Ohereza kopi irinzwe n'ijambo ry'ibanga kugirango usubize ku kindi gikoresho.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Ohereza amahamagara n’ubutumwa winjirirwa kuri telefoni cyangwa imeri byemejwe. Ubutumwa bujya hanze bushobora kugaragaza numero yawe ya Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Hitamo ubutumwa cyangwa icyumba cyo kuganiramo kugirango utangire kuganira
